message.body: Hi there!
Hello!
Is this the same person from yesterday or do u just have the same handle
Yes! It's me! I've been set up with repeat texters a few times now. I wonder how big the participant pool is
Lol, was just telling my aunt about this and well, now ur not a total stranger
(She asked who I was texting)
Of course we r about to eat dinner, so I think her question was a hint...brb
Ha!
Ok, so the kiddo is bathed and ready for bed. Note for ur future... Try to set as early a bedtime as possible because once the kids are asleep, that's when u get to relax
Ah! Good advice. I need lots of relaxation time!
I hear ya!
Are u still in school? Working?
I am well out of school. I work, I'm an epidemiologist. Work at CDC
Aha, interesting! Just finished my doctorate in clinical psych and am having the hardest time finding a postdoc in my little town. Hence, enjoying mommytime (albeit still antsy).
So epidemiologist is where you identify the origin of illnesses?
Excellent! I studied psych undergrad! I love the field!! Yes I'm like those guys in Contagion and Outbreak
U get that a lot, lol ??
I do. Everyone asks if I'm a skin doctor.
Lol, that's a small part of it. Well hopefully I'm nothing like most of the psychologists on tv!! Although tv usually portrays a psychiatrist as the ther
I worked for a year in a mental institution and found it frustrating and rewarding at the same time
apist, which is (and should be) rare
I just finished a year at a residential facility with adolescent males, all w history of trauma, foster kids and all had sexual offense convictions. Mixed feelings every day...
They were amazingly resilient, yet damaged, and inspiring, and exhausting
Oooof. What internal struggle!!!! You are going important work!
So sad what people do to children and then wonder why they grow up to harm others
Exactly! That cycle is nearly impossible to break!
It is, I think out of my caseload, I am hopeful for about 20% and they were going home to loving families
Do you ever hear follow up on the cases? Like 10 years later?
No, that would break hipaa/ethics unfortunately. I have a few that I think about over the years, though. I just hope I helped them nearly as much as they
I absolutely understand that. :)
taught me...
